name: Mysteries & Nightmares: Morgiana
description: Will you solve the mystery of the abandoned enchanted castle and its mysterious resident? Seek for the clues in its ancient underground, seek for the portals to different worlds. Seek for the truth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
